definition: to settle down and get married (of a man)/to become a recognized expert
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
surname Cheng

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 傢伙|家伙[jia1 huo5]
to get married and start a career (idiom)/to settle down/to establish oneself
to get married (idiom)

sentences.english: He tomcatted around before settling down.
This is the first to suggest that settling down and having children actually causes the fall.
sentences.chinese: 该研究首次证实了成家和生子确实会导致睾丸素减少。

sentences.english: In 1986, Huang Ho marriage and families, the bad and still not changed.
sentences.chinese: 1986年，黄与何结婚成家后，依然劣性不改。

sentences.english: And now he's settled down into married life.
sentences.chinese: 现在他已经安定下来结婚成家了。

sentences.english: And a key step to becoming that man is to find a wife and raise a family.
sentences.chinese: 成为那样的男人需要经历的关键的一步是成家立业。

sentences.english: To be something and somebody was Harriman's fondest wish for his son.
sentences.chinese: 哈里曼最大的心愿就是希望他的儿子能成名成家。

sentences.english: He made a small fortune, intent on marriage and settling down.
sentences.chinese: 他发了小财，一心想结婚成家过安定的日子。

sentences.english: I think the others hope they can be the one that settles me down .
sentences.chinese: 我想另外一些都是希望能和我成家的人。

sentences.english: And the eldest sister is already married.
sentences.chinese: 长子和长女都已经成家。

sentences.english: It’s in your best interest to get married and start a family, lest you end up dying alone.
sentences.chinese: 结婚成家，唯恐一个人孤独地死去。

sentences.english: I am 56 years old this year. My children have families of their own.
sentences.chinese: 今年56岁，现在孩子们都们各自成家立业了。

sentences.english: he has like, a family there.
sentences.chinese: 他已经在日本成家立业了。

sentences.english: You won't remember getting married or having children.
sentences.chinese: 你不会记得自己已经成家立室。

sentences.english: But after getting married to celebrate New Year's Eve , hold not over of heart, do not over .
sentences.chinese: 而成家后过年，却有操不完的心，做不完的事。

sentences.english: Ducks son no niang also grew up, how much is a family with nothing.
sentences.chinese: 鸭仔无娘也长大，几多白手也成家。
